message.content:
cs.CG, cs.NA, cs.IT, cs.DS, cs.SI. 

The paper deals with developing a novel sampling theorem and fast algorithms for representing signals on the sphere. This involves computational geometry (cs.CG) for associating the sphere with the torus, numerical analysis (cs.NA) for analyzing the number of samples required, information theory (cs.IT) for discussing compressive sampling, and data structures (cs.DS) and signal processing (cs.SI) for developing efficient algorithms.
